original: Meuller, Gustaf, ko’n traktsprost, Bengtsfors, f. 24/8/77 i Öxtabäck, Älvs-b. 1. G. 04 m. Ingrid Levan. Barn : Inga f. 05, ämneslär., Visby, Helge 09, ing. v. SKF, Gbg, Gunnar 12, lektor v. tekn. gymn., Gbg. — Mog :ex. i Halmstad 96, fiil. kand. 00, teor. teol. ex. 02, prästv. f. Karlstads -stift 03, folkskoll:ex. 04. Pastorsadj. i Sillerud 03, v. pastor i Arvika 04, vakanskommin. i Boda 05, rektor v. Malmköp. h. folksk. 06, v. Marstrands h. folksk. 10, kyrkoh. i Laxarby sed. 16, kontr :prost i Norra Dals kontr. ised. 30. Skr.: Predikan om dopet, Laxarby kyrka o. dess restaurering, Predikan v. Billings-fors kyrkas invign. (18), Predikan f. första prästmötesdagen i Karlstad (41). LVO.
translated: Meuller, Gustaf, rural dean, Bengtsfors, b. 24/8/77 in Öxtabäck, Älvsburg. Married in 1904 to Ingrid Levan. Children: Inga b. 1905, subject teacher, Visby; Helge b. 1909, engineer at SKF, Gothenburg; Gunnar b. 1912, teacher at technical gymnasium, Gothenburg. Received B.A. in Halmstad in 1896, B.Ed. in 1900, theoretical theology degree in 1902, ordained priest in the Karlstad diocese in 1903, primary school teaching degree in 1904. Assistant pastor in Sillerud in 1903, acting pastor in Arvika in 1904, temporary vicar in Boda in 1905, headmaster of Malmköping primary school in 1906, headmaster of Marstrand primary school in 1910, parish priest in Laxarby since 1916, rural dean of Norra Dals district since 1930. Written works: Sermon about baptism, Laxarby church and its restoration, Sermon at the inauguration of Billingsfors church (1918), Sermon for the first clergy meeting in Karlstad (1941). Awarded Royal Order of Vasa (LVO).

works.name: Predikan v. Billingsfors kyrkas invign.
works.about: Sermon at the inauguration of Billingsfors church (1918)

works.name: Predikan f. första prästmötesdagen i Karlstad
works.about: Sermon for the first clergy meeting in Karlstad (1941)
